message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10,000. This is a great deal for a product worth much more. Let me know if you're interested!
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate it, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $9,500 for your product. Let me know if this is within your range.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still hoping for a bit more. I'm willing to come down to $9,750. This is a fair price considering the value of the product. Let me know what you think.

Hello Alice, I've considered your latest offer and while I understand your position, I would like to propose a price of $9,500 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations and allows us to reach an agreement.
